overview:
Rod Weir is Vice President of Sales and Business Development of Tungle. Prior to Tungle, Weir was Global Sales Director of Nimcat where he was responsible for international OEM sales and business development efforts for Nimcatâ€™s Peer To Peer software telephony offer. After Nimcatâ€™s acquisition by Avaya, Weir remained at Avaya as Global Sales Director.

Previously, Rod has held various management and sales roles at Cisco Canada, Lucent Technologies, Bell Canada, and several other ventures.

degrees.institution: Richard Ivey School of Business, University of Western Ontario
